Application Web Server VIs

Owning Palette: Web Services VIs

Requires: Full Development System (Real-Time, Windows). This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Application Web Server VIs to support Web services deployed to the Application Web Server.

Note  This topic assumes familiarity with the Web services introduction and tutorial.
SubpaletteDescription
Output VIsUse the Output VIs to configure Embedded Server Pages (ESP) scripting on the Application Web Server.

These VIs work only when you publish Web services to the Application Web Server.
Security VIsUse the Security VIs to encrypt and decrypt data transfers.

These VIs work only when you publish Web services to the Application Web Server.
Sessions VIsUse the Sessions VIs to manage HTTP sessions and session variables. You can create and destroy HTTP sessions, read and write session variables, and return session information.

These VIs work only when you publish Web services to the Application Web Server.
